headline: Argus cuts Arthur J. Gallagher target, sees buying opportunity on selloff
summary: Argus lowered the firm’s price target on Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) to $330 from $370 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares following the Q2 report. The views the recent pullback in the shares as a buying opportunity. Argus expects organic growth of more than 9% in the company’s brokerage unit in 2025, compared to its forecast of 6%-8%. The company has 40 term sheets signed or being prepared, representing approximately $500M of annualized revenue, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Pu
